name: LadyAgri Impact Investment Hub
goal:
LadyAgri Investment Hub
A Womens Agri-Business Innovation Hub bringing together International Women Business Angels to finance, mentor and coach African Women in Agri-Business and Agri-Services in Africa and Small Island Developing States..
The project summary:

 LadyAgri Investment Hub aims to inspire, disrupt and connect by bringing together Women African entrepreneurs, innovators and International Business Angels investors, philanthropists and Public donors who promote a Blended public private finance model.
 The LadyAgri Syndicate investment fund unites business angel investors principally International business women and financiers who wish to contribute to enhancing female driven agri-supply chains and services, and availability of quality food products on African national, regional and international markets. Those who want to promote the ‘Made in Africa’ label of origin.
 The LadyAgri Investment Hub will be driven by International business women who wish to invest in, transfer knowledge, capacity building, mentoring, coaching and provision of strategic advice on how to position products, run an ethical and sustainable agri-business and agri-service.
 The Investment hub will serve as a bridge between public investment and private investment by sourcing, vetting, carrying out risk assessments through its network of experts in-country. This will allow a steady pipeline of ‘bankable’ women led investment projects focused on enhancing trade, creating local jobs with a broad social impact.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Trade, Youth
